hero.title: Help Russians who oppose the war
hero.subtitle: Kovcheg is the largest project supporting anti-war Russians both in exile and within the country

cta.title: OVER A MILLION PEOPLE
cta.paragraph1: have left Russia due to their opposition to the invasion of Ukraine, due to repressions and persecution, and due to their refusal to participate in the war.
cta.paragraph2: Most left with nowhere to go. Without money or prospects. In foreign lands, far from loved ones, many are struggling with depression.
cta.paragraph3: These people volunteer, help refugees, participate in the anti-war movement, and fight against the war.
cta.paragraph4: Kovcheg helps them adapt to their new life, get back on their feet, and continue their fight for peace.
cta.paragraph5: To continue their struggle, they need your help!

aboutKovcheg.title: MORE ABOUT KOVCHEG
aboutKovcheg.description: Kovcheg was founded in March 2022 in response to the persecution of Russians who opposed the war in Ukraine. For two years now, we have been helping those who need it most

helped.text: have already received help from Kovcheg in 70 countries

finalCta.text: Every month, hundreds of people are forced to leave Russia due to their opposition to the war and repressions.
